title: Flintshire: Firefighters tackle blaze at commercial property
content: Firefighters have tackled a blaze at a commercial property in a town centre.The fire broke out on the high street of Connah's Quay, Flintshire at about 21:15 BST on Saturday, North Wales Fire and Rescue Service said.Two fire crews from Deeside and one from Buckley attended the incident.The cause of the fire is not yet known. An inspection was due to be carried out on Sunday morning the fire service added.
